result.eng: His talk was a little obscure.

result.eng: The walk had warmed me up a little.

result.eng: It was a little difficult.

result.eng: Wait a little!

result.eng: I only have a little money.

result.eng: You're only a little girl.

result.eng: A story about a little girl who goes to the wood.

result.eng: Gaudí's buildings are a little strange.

result.eng: I'm running late a little.

result.orig: Tá moill bheag orm
result.html: Tá moill bheag ormI'm running late a little.

result.eng: I am a little tired.

result.html: Tá mé rud beag tuirseachI am a little tired.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé rud beag tuirseaċI am a little tired.

result.eng: I speak a little French and I am learning Spanish at present.
result.ga: Labhraím beagáinín Fraincise agus tá mé ag foghlaim Spáinnise faoi láthair

result.eng: They speak a little Welsh.

result.eng: One week was nice and warm, but the second week was a little cold.
result.ga: Bhí seachtain amháin deas te ach bhí an dara seachtain beagáinín fuar

result.ponchtml: Ḃí seaċtain aṁáin deas te aċ ḃí an dara seaċtain beagáinín fuarOne week was nice and warm, but the second week was a little cold.

result.eng: You were so alike when you were little!
result.ga: Bhí sibh chomh cosúil lena chéile nuair a bhí sibh beag
result.orig: Bhí sibh chomh cosúil lena chéile nuair a bhí sibh beag

result.ponchtml: Ḃí siḃ ċoṁ cosúil lena ċéile nuair a ḃí siḃ beagYou were so alike when you were little!

result.eng: I makes the page look a lot better if it is a little mode colourful than that.
result.ga: Cuireann sé go mór le maise an leathanaigh má bhíonn sé beagáinín níos dathúla ná sin
result.orig: Cuireann sé go mór le maise an leathanaigh má bhíonn sé beagáinín níos dathúla ná sin
result.html: Cuireann sé go mór le maise an leathanaigh má bhíonn sé beagáinín níos dathúla ná sinI makes the page look a lot better if it is a little mode colourful than that.

result.eng: One of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.
result.ga: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidín
result.orig: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidín
result.html: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidínOne of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.
result.ponchtml: Rinne duine aṁáin drannaḋ liom agus ḃraiṫ mé ċoṁ beag le mo lúidínOne of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.

result.eng: He recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.
result.ga: D'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúint
result.orig: D'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúint
result.html: D'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúintHe recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.
result.ponchtml: D'earcaiġ sé 15 duine eile naċ raiḃ mórán taiṫí acu aċ i ḃforéigean agus ċuadar faoi oiliúintHe recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.

result.eng: Because of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ga: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.orig: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.html: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ponchtml: De ḃarr na ḃforbairtí seo ḃí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránaċ a ṫug deis dó feiḋmiú mar iriseoir ar ḃonn doṁanda agus ar ḃeagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.

result.eng: People get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.
result.ga: Is beag sásamh a bhaintear as athchúrsáil a dhéanamh ar ábhar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile cheana féin
result.orig: Is beag sásamh a bhaintear as athchúrsáil a dhéanamh ar ábhar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile cheana féin

result.ponchtml: Is beag sásaṁ a ḃaintear as aṫċúrsáil a ḋéanaṁ ar áḃar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile ċeana féinPeople get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.

result.eng: Some writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
result.ga: Is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blaganna

result.eng: But him playing with little boats, at his age!
result.ga: Ach eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snámh san aois a bhfuil sé ann

result.ponchtml: Aċ eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snáṁ san aois a ḃfuil sé annBut him playing with little boats, at his age!

result.eng: In the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
result.ga: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháin
result.orig: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháin
result.html: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháinIn the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
result.ponchtml: Sa ġeiṁreaḋ ba ġnáċ leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a ḋéanaṁ sna sruṫáinIn the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.

result.eng: It's a little early for someone like you to be interested in playing cards.

result.eng: How little is what you have done worth to you?

result.ponchtml: Cá beag duit a ḃfuil déanta agatHow little is what you have done worth to you?

result.eng: You could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.
result.ga: Thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne tú

result.eng: When I have a little money I'll send for you.

result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃeas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfiḋ mé fá do ċoinneWhen I have a little money I'll send for you.

result.eng: A little later in the day he bought some bread.

result.eng: A little while after it got dark...
